sentences.sContent: Only in 1809, when she returned to Hampshire and settled in the cottage on the Chawton estate of her brother Edward, could she devote herself to her work again.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only in 1809, when she returned to Hampshire and settled in the cottage on the Chawton estate of her brother Edward, could she devote herself to her work again.
sentences.sCn: 在那儿，写作几不可能。 直到1809年，她回到汉普郡，安置在兄长爱德华在查顿的一所小屋中，才能够再次全心投入到自己的工作中去。

trans.tranCn: 汉普郡(英国南部之一郡)
